TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlWindow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示包含一个或多个 实例的逻辑窗口。

span.span: Represents the logical window that contains one or more instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应与在 Windows 窗体或 Win32 API; 窗口的概念混淆没有任何`HWND`或类似 Windows 资源，直接对应的实例。 should not be confused with the concept of a window in Windows Forms or the Win32 API; there is no `HWND` or similar Windows resource that corresponds directly to an instance of . 相反，上用户的屏幕，以及用于与通过提示和对话框的用户交互的方法提供的文档的位置的高级说明。Rather, provides high-level descriptions of a document's location on a user's screen, as well as methods for interacting with users by way of prompts and dialog boxes. 充当 Web 页面的文档和其元数据，例如文档的位置和 Web 浏览器的功能的逻辑容器。 acts as a logical container for a Web page's documents and its metadata, such as the document's location and the capabilities of the Web browser. 一种 Web 页包含单个文档，或者`FRAMESET`包含一个或多个`FRAME`元素，其中每个承载其自己的文档。A Web page consists of a single document, or a `FRAMESET` containing one or more `FRAME` elements, each of which hosts its own document. Web 开发人员使用框架集以显示逻辑上相关的页面并排显示 （例如，内容旁边导航页页）。Web developers use framesets to show logically related pages side by side (for example, a content page next to a navigation page). 当包含单个文档的页面时，你可以访问它通过属性; 如果则页面使用帧，您可以访问其文档，一直到集合，其中包括一个或多个对象。When a page consists of a single document, you can access it through the property of ; if the page uses frames, you can access their documents through the collection, which consists of one or more objects. 当你的主机控件在 Windows 窗体应用程序，你可以选择与使用标准 Windows 窗体类，如用户交互或，或者可以在使用方法针对此用途定义。When your host the control in a Windows Forms application, you can choose to interact with the user using standard Windows Forms classes, such as or , or you can use methods on defined for this purpose. 方法具有自定义文本中显示一个简单的对话框和**确定**按钮;向用户; 呈现自定义文本和文本输入的字段的行和的自定义文本线显示一个对话框和**确定**和**取消**按钮。The method presents a simple dialog box with custom text and an **OK** button; presents a line of custom text and a text input field to the user; and presents a dialog box with a line of custom text and **OK** and **Cancel** buttons. 你可以使用打开包含新的文档的新窗口。You can use to open new windows containing new documents. 将指定的 URL 加载到已命名的窗口中，如果不存在，请创建它，而始终在新创建的窗口中打开其 URL。 loads the specified URL into the named window, creating it if it does not already exist, while always opens its URL in a newly created window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个方法。The following code example contains two methods. 第一个将在名为的窗口中打开 URL `displayWindow`，这便会创建的状态栏显示。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. 第二个在相同的窗口中，打开另一个 URL，但指定应显示仅位置栏。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 请注意窗口和显示控件的维度取决于在其上第一次打开 URL。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含控件名为`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否窗口已关闭。Use the property to determine if the window is already closed. 如果窗口已关闭，则此方法将产生任何影响。If the window is already closed, this method will have no effect. 当你创建新的 windows 使用或，导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果不调用上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态甚至在你的应用程序关闭后。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application closes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开一个窗口，并将其关闭，如果用户在过去 5 分钟内未使用它。The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes. 编写的代码示例时，假设你的窗体具有控件名为`WebBrowser1`、名为`Button1`，和一个类名为`Timer1`。The code example was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, a named `Button1`, and a class named `Timer1`. 若要成功运行此示例中，更改提供给第一个自变量到有效的 URL。To run this example successfully, change the first argument supplied to to a valid URL. summary.span: 当窗口内部运行的脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when script running inside of the window encounters a run-time error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 页面可以包含用 JScript 或 VBScript，当加载页时可以执行通常编写的脚本代码。HTML pages can contain script code, usually written in JScript or VBScript, that executes when a page is loaded. 脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。 occurs whenever a script encounters a run-time error. 因为脚本代码位于后期绑定，这意味着，与对象的调用不被解析直到运行时错误可能包括中引用 null 对象到调用未定义的属性或方法的所有内容。Because script code is late-bound, which means that calls against the object are not resolved until run-time, errors can include everything from referencing a null object to calling an undefined property or method. 你可以设置属性为 true，以便防止 Internet 资源管理器中的本机错误对话框显示。You can set the property of to true in order to prevent the native error dialog box in Internet Explorer from displaying. 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx). ## Examples 下面的代码示例捕获结果时在 HTML 页上的脚本尝试访问文档中未定义的对象的错误。The following code example traps the error that results when a script on an HTML page attempts to access an object that is not defined in the document. 此页必须是完全加载之前事件处理程序附加，否则此示例将不起作用。The page must be fully loaded before the event handler is attached, otherwise the example will not work. remarks.format: ## Remarks A`FRAME`是一套中定义的 windows `FRAMESET`。A `FRAME` is a set of windows defined within a `FRAMESET`. `FRAME`s 启用承载单个文档中的多个文档。`FRAME`s enable hosting multiple documents within a single document. 每个`FRAME`被定义为具有一定行和列宽度，并且是相对于其他页上的位置`FRAME`中定义的 s `FRAMESET`; 的位置`FRAME`固定的虽然用户有时可以使用鼠标游标来增加或缩减`FRAME`。Each `FRAME` is defined as possessing a certain row and column width, and is position on the page in relation to the other `FRAME`s defined within the `FRAMESET`; the position of a `FRAME` is fixed, although a user may sometimes use the mouse cursor to grow or shrink the `FRAME`. `IFRAME`是类似于的框架，但它不需要定位在固定位置。An `IFRAME` is similar to a frame, but it need not be anchored in a fixed position. 框架将包含的一个实例每个`FRAME`或`IFRAME`在网页中定义。Frames will contain one instance of for each `FRAME` or `IFRAME` defined within a Web page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查包含框架的页内的所有文档，并从将来检查每个页中创建的所有传出的超链接表。The following code example inspects each document within a page containing frames and creates a table of all of the outgoing hyperlinks from each page for future inspection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已由用户或通过调用关闭方法，尝试导航到新 URL 或访问窗口的文档将导致错误。If the has been closed by the user or by way of a call to the method, attempting to navigate to a new URL or access the window's document will result in an error. 使用此属性以确定它是否是安全地在当前窗口对象上调用属性和方法。Use this property to determine whether it is safe to call properties and methods on the current window object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开一个窗口，并将其关闭，如果用户在过去 5 分钟内未使用它。The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes. 该代码示例要求你窗体具有控件名为`WebBrowser1`、名为`Button1`，和一个类名为`Timer1`。The code example requires that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, a named `Button1`, and a class named `Timer1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用到移动从屏幕可见边缘中移出窗口; 此方法还可通过脚本在网页上，并且允许不受信任的脚本来呈现 windows 不可见被视为不安全。You cannot use to move a window off of the visible edge of the screen; this method is also available through script on a Web page, and allowing untrusted script to render windows invisible is not considered secure. 将引发如果想要移动的窗口和其父窗口具有不同的顶级域。 will raise an if the window you are trying to move and its parent window have different top-level domains. 例如，如果您要承载控制指向 a.adatum.com，创建一个新窗口使用以显示 b.adatum.com。在这种情况下，这两个窗口被视为是相同的顶级域的一部分，不会引发异常。For example, if you are hosting the control pointing to a.adatum.com, create a new window using to display b.adatum.com. In this case, both windows are considered to be part of the same top-level domain, and the exception is not thrown. 但是，如果调用若要显示 www,microsoft.com，两个窗口，现在具有不同的顶级域，与操作将导致要引发的异常。However, if you call to display www,microsoft.com, the two windows now have different top-level domains, and the operation will cause the exception to throw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`参数指向 HTML 页，将销毁当前显示在窗口中的页面，并将其替换为新页面持有; 不能在旧的页中的托管 DOM 对象保存你的应用程序的任何引用。If the `url` parameter points to an HTML page, the page currently displayed in the window will be destroyed and replaced with the new page; any references your application holds to managed DOM objects in the old page will not be valid. 如果`url`点到 Internet 资源管理器无法显示的资源，则用户将看到一个对话框，询问你是否要打开在应用程序，保存它以磁盘，或取消下载操作外部资源。If `url` points to a resource that cannot be displayed by Internet Explorer, the user will be presented with a dialog box asking whether to open the resource outside of the application, save it to disk, or cancel the download operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`参数可以名称创建的以前调用的结果为一个窗口。The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 参数也可以指向通过单击超链接打开的窗口 (`A`元素) 或`FORM`用元素`TARGET`特性在新窗口中打开其 URL。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 以下 HTML 代码将打开一个名为的新窗口`orderWindow`当用户单击它：The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果提供的任何选项`windowOptions`参数，不包含任何选项会自动禁用。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 换而言之，如果您仅通过指定`windowOptions`要包含状态栏中，则菜单栏、 工具栏、 标题、 滚动条等将不会显示除非你显式启用它们通过`windowOptions`。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果引用的文件`url`是某一 HTML 文件、 文本文件或其他可以在 Internet Explorer 内承载的文件类型它将在已命名的窗口中显示。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果不能在 Internet Explorer 内显示的文件和名为的目标窗口不存在，则窗口将打开仅足够长的时间 Internet Explorer 下载资源;它将立即关闭之后。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 当你创建新的 windows 使用或，它将导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果不调用上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果你使用加载在现有窗口中，URL`windowOptions`将被忽略; 维度、 外观和屏幕位置首先由首次调用都将保留窗口。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`参数可以名称创建的以前调用的结果为一个窗口。The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 参数也可以指向通过单击超链接打开的窗口 (`A`元素) 或`FORM`用元素`TARGET`特性在新窗口中打开其 URL。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 以下 HTML 代码将打开一个名为的新窗口`orderWindow`当用户单击它：The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果提供的任何选项`windowOptions`参数，不包含任何选项会自动禁用。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 换而言之，如果您仅通过指定`windowOptions`要包含状态栏中，则菜单栏、 工具栏、 标题、 滚动条等将不会显示除非你显式启用它们通过`windowOptions`。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果引用的文件`url`是某一 HTML 文件、 文本文件或其他可以在 Internet Explorer 内承载的文件类型它将在已命名的窗口中显示。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果不能在 Internet Explorer 内显示的文件和名为的目标窗口不存在，则窗口将打开仅足够长的时间 Internet Explorer 下载资源;它将立即关闭之后。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 当你创建新的 windows 使用或，它将导致 HTML 文档对象模型，以便打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果不调用上所有已创建的 windows，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果你使用加载在现有窗口中，URL`windowOptions`将被忽略; 维度、 外观和屏幕位置首先由首次调用都将保留窗口。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个方法：The following code example contains two methods: - 第一个将在名为的窗口中打开 URL `displayWindow`，这便会创建的状态栏显示。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. - 第二个在相同的窗口中，打开另一个 URL，但指定应显示仅位置栏。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 请注意窗口和显示控件的维度取决于在其上第一次打开 URL。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含控件名为`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一种快速、 简单的方法，以获得用户的简单文本输入。 provides a quick, easy way to obtain simple text input from the user. 尽管接受 Unicode 文本作为输入，Internet Explorer 脚本提示符上将不显示非拉丁语言文本适当 Windows 95、 Windows 98、 Windows ME 或 Windows NT 由于操作系统限制。Although accepts Unicode text as input, the Internet Explorer script prompt will not display non-Latin language text appropriately on Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows ME or Windows NT due to operating system limitations. 有关详细信息，请参阅[信息： Internet Explorer 脚本将提示和 MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147)。For more information, see [INFO: Internet Explorer Script Prompts and MBCS/Unicode](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;211147).

summary.span: 将窗口移动到指定的坐标。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将导致要向下滚动，以便在文档上的指定的坐标位于文档的窗口的左上角的文档。 will cause the document to scroll so that the specified coordinate on the document is located in the upper-left corner of the document's window. 如果该文档不是长或不够宽，这种情况，将按指定的方向尽可能文档中滚动。If the document is not long or wide enough for this to happen, will scroll through the document as far as possible in the specified direction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例滚动到用户单击的坐标位置的文档。The following code example scrolls through the document to the coordinate position clicked by the user.
